Detention Camp Warden:
The dungeon monster camp in this castle was only recently discovered.
Apparently, some long-dead emperor created this place years and years ago in order to breed the monsters for the sake of magical experimentation.
Another rumor says that this place was used as a prison for criminals and evil creatures.
Whatever the real reason for its existence, the entrance had been hidden for a very long time.
Since you've volunteered your services, your task will be to eliminate Beautiful Atrielle, Nagen the Tomboy and Jax the Destroyer, creatures that are members of the last of three small groups in the castle dungeon and obtain the sign of the camp prisoner's leader.
"I would like to know the current situation in the dungeon"
